13705.「あんときは 世話になったな。\n アンタらのおかげで 悪の道から\n 足を洗う:
Thanks for your help back then. Thanks to you,
I was able to get away from the path of evil.

13706.「……ところで アンタ\n 親父の試練で ここまで来たんだろ？\n だとしたら:
By the way... you came all the way here
because of your father's ordeal, right? You're
not good enough as it is.

13707.「親父は かいとうの仮面を装備して\n ここに来いって 言ってなかったか？\n:
Didn't my father tell you to come here
equipped with a mask? And yet, you're not
wearing one.

13708.「さいわい ギャスモンのヤツも\n まだ 現れてねえ。サササっと戻って\n かい:
Fortunately, Buntzenberner hasn't shown up
yet. Go back and get your Kaito Mask.

13710.「……おっ 親父の言いつけどおり\n かいとうの仮面を 装備してきたようだな。:
Looks like you've equipped yourself with the
mask of Kaito, just like my father said.

13711.「あとは ギャスモンとの戦闘中に\n ギャスモンハートを 盗みとってから\n と:
All that was left was to steal Buntzenberner's
Heart during the battle and then finish him
off.

13714.「あの野郎には 借りがあるからよ\n 本当は この手で 引導を渡してやりてえが…:
I owe that bastard a debt of gratitude, and I'd really like to take it out on him myself, but... I'll take care of the
rest. I'll take care of the rest.

13715.「親父を超える 盗賊王……。\n アンタなら なれる！ がんばってくれ！:
You're gonna be a better thief than your old
man! You can do it!

13716.「ホウホウホウ……。クックック……。\n 汝ハ ちから二 アフレテイルナ。\n:
Ho-ho-ho... ku-ku-ku-ku-ku-ku... You're aflame
with the power of knowledge. How dare you join
hands with me?

13717.「……イヤ 答エヲ 待ツコトナド出来ヌ。\n ソレホドマデニ 見事ナ器ヨ……。\:
I cannot wait for an answer. You are a
magnificent vessel... whose power I desire...

13718.「欲シイ 欲シイ ソノちからガ 欲シイ……！\n<br>\n「コノママ 汝ノ身体:
I want it, I want it, I want it, I want it, I
want it...! Mama, I am possessed by your body!

13721.「前回は 惜しかったな。\n 今度こそ ギャスモンの野郎を仕留めて\n 試練クリ:
That was a close call last time. Let's finish
off Buntzenberner this time and complete the
ordeal.

13722.「いいかい？ ヤツに とどめをさす前に\n ちゃんと ギャスモンハートを盗むんだ:
Okay? You have to steal the Buntzenberner's
heart before he finishes the job. Don't forget
that.

13724.「来たぞ！ ヤツだ！\n 今度こそ頼むぜ <cs_pchero>さん！:
Here he comes! It's him! You're gonna get it
this time, <cs_pchero>!

13725.「クックック……。良カッタ。\n モウ 会エナイカト 思ッテイタ……。: I'm glad. I thought I'd never see you again...

13726.「汝ノヨウナ 見事ナ器\n 取リ逃ガスワケニハ イカヌ……。: I can't let you miss such a fine vessel...

13727.「欲シイ 欲シイ ソノちからガ 欲シイ……！:
I want it, I want it, I want it, I want it, I
want it...!

13728.「今度コソ 汝ノ身体二\n 憑依シテクレルワァァァァ！！！: Now I'm going to possess your body!

13730.「我ガ肉体ハ 仮ノモノ……。\n ユエニ 肉体ヲ 何度 滅ボシテモ\n 無駄ダ…:
My body is a temporary thing, and no matter
how many times I try to destroy it...

13731.「クックック……。マタ 会オウ。\n スバラシキ器ノ 持チ主ヨ……。:
I'll see you soon. The Lord of the wondrous
vessels...

13732.「そうか……。ギャスモンハートを盗まないと\n ヤツは 完全に倒せないんだったな:
Well... he can't be completely defeated
without stealing the Buntzenberner's Heart...

13733.「なあ <cs_pchero>さんよ。\n ここは アンタのウデの見せどころだぜ:
Hey, <cs_pchero>. This is where you show off
your skills.

13734.「あいつに ぬすむを使って ギャスモンハートを\n 盗んでから とどめをさすんだ:
Half-Inch him, steal his Buntzenberner Heart,
and then finish him off! You can do it! Next
time!

13735.<cs_pchero>は\nギャスモンハート（だいじなもの）を盗んで\nギャスモ:
<cs_pchero>
stole the Buntzenberner Heart (Key Item) and
put an end to Buntzenberner!

13736.「シ…シマッタ……。\n 我ガ心 奪ワレタカ……。\n コノママデハ…… ウッ…:
I... have... been... deprived... of... my...
heart... by... my... mother...

13738.「やったな！ <cs_pchero>さん！\n アンタ やっぱり すげえや！:
You did it! <cs_pchero>! You're still
awesome!

13739.「……この間までの オレは\n さっきのギャスモンと 同じだった。\n 欲望に負:
I was just like Buntzenberner before. I lost
sight of myself because of my desires.

13740.「オレは それが 間違っていると思わなかった。\n 盗賊ってのは みんな 自分の:
I didn't think it was wrong. I thought that
all thieves were motivated by their own greed.

13741.「でもよ。<cs_pchero>さん アンタは違う。\n アンタは 自分のためじ:
But. <cs_pchero> You are different. You're a
thief not for yourself, but to save or protect
someone else.

13742.「親父も きっと\n そうだったんだよな……。: I bet my dad was the same way...

13743.「さて ギャスモンも いなくなったことだし\n オレは アンタみたいな 盗賊を目:
Now that Buntzenberner is gone, I'm off to
train to become a thief like you.

13744.「じゃあな <cs_pchero>さん。\n 縁があったら また会おうや！:
See ya <cs_pchero>. See you again when I get
a chance!

13745.「ああ そうだ！ 親父には\n 試練をクリアしたって 報告しとくからよ。\n ち:
Oh, yeah! I'll tell my dad you completed the
ordeal. You better get back to Gatara!

13746.「やれやれ。かなわないね アンタには。: Oh, man. I'm no match for you.

13747.「マスク・ド・ムーチョが 用意した試練を\n あっさり こなしちまうなんてさ。:
I can't believe that he easily completed the
ordeal that Mask de Mucho had prepared for
him.

13748.「<pc> アンタは 旅の盗賊だ。\n ひとつの町に とどまらないのも 知ってい:
<pc> You are a traveling thief.
You're a traveling bandit, and we know you
don't stay in one town.

13749.「だから あたいらは\n アンタを 引き止めたりしないよ。\n むしろ アンタの:
That's why we don't want to hold you back.
We'd rather see more of you.

13750.「……でもね <pc>。\n これだけは 覚えといておくれ。\n アンタは ダル:
...but <pc>. Just remember this. You
are the pride of the Darul Thieves.

13751.「あたいらも いつか アンタに\n 追いつけるよう このガタラを守りながら\n:
We will keep this Gatara and improve our
skills so that we can catch up with you
someday.

13752.「ブデチョ…… いや ムーチョさんも\n あたいらに 協力してくれるはずさ。: Budecho... no, Mucho will help us.

13753.「いや…… ワシが してやれることは\n もう 何もないだろう。: No... there's nothing more I can do for you.

13754.「義の心は 揺らぐことなく\n 若い お前たちに 受け継がれたのだからな。\n:
The spirit of righteousness has been passed on
unwaveringly to you young people. Nothing
could make me happier.

13756.「頼りにしてるぞ！ ダルル盗賊団！: I'm counting on you! Darul Thieves!

42167.「それから ギャスモンハートは\n ひとつあれば 充分だ。１個 盗んだら\n ギ:
One Buntzenberner Heart is all you need, and
once you've stolen one, you must devote
yourself to defeating Buntzenberner.

42168.「いいかい？ ギャスモンハートは\n ひとつあれば 充分だ。１個 盗んだら\n:
Okay? One Buntzenberner Heart is all you need,
and once you've stolen one, you can focus on
defeating Buntzenberner.
